QuestData.Title: Circle the Wagons
QuestData.Description:
Darion and the girls should have been back by now.
Maybe they had trouble on the road, that old wagon is always breaking down. I need to be sure they are safe!
Can you check on them for me?
QuestData.CompletionText: I'm getting worried, they should have been here hours ago.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you. I can rest easy knowing they are safe.
